pageProps.content:
![Andong Ontrepieum (안동 온뜨레피움)](/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018997_image2_1.webp) ## Overview > Ontrepieum, meaning "to bloom flowers in a garden," is situated in Andong's Cultural Tourism Complex. With an area of approximately 30,000 ㎡, it consists of a 1,500 ㎡ tropical green house, a 6,600 ㎡ herb garden, farming land, an animal performance theater, a nature experience section, and other areas. The tropical greenhouse features tropical and subtropical plants, including herbs, coffee and palm trees. Over 17,000 trees planted in the park, along with its water fountain and photo zones, make it the perfect place for a fun weekend getaway, not to mention that it has been used as a filming location. It is a fantastic place to take some photos with a unique feel.
The Andong Cultural Tourism Complex also has a couple of attractions nearby, including a KBS studio, the Korea Folk Museum, the Water Museum and Arts and Crafts Museum. ## Intro | | | | - | - | |accomcount:|Approx. 7,500 people| |expagerange:|Open to visitors ages 5 and older| |infocenter:|• 1330 Travel Hotline: +82-2-1330
(Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese)
• For more info: +82-54-823-8850| |opendate:|April 1, 2011| |parking:|Available (163 regular parking spaces, 3 designated parking spaces, 12 large parking spaces)| |restdate:|Mondays| |usetime:|10:00-18:00 (Ticketing closes at 17:00)| ## Detail Info | | | | - | - | |Film Locations:|KBS TV Drama Filming Location - Taejo Wang Geon, Age of Warriors, Hong Gil-dong (Nearby the port and the coast)| |Admission Fees:|Individual - Adults 2,000 won / Children & senior citizens 1,500 won
Groups (20 or more) - Adults 1,500 won / Children & senior citizens 1,000 won
* Free: Infants (ages 2 and under)
* Adults (from middle school student to ages 64) / Children (ages 2 to elementary school)| |Available Facilities:|Mini train, Light tunnels, Windmills Cafes, Topieori garden, 4D theater, Farmer's Land, Children's playground, Central Square, Rainbow Pond, Green Planet Green House, Ontre's Snacks, DIY Experiences, 3D Cinema, Herb garden, Rock Garden, Green Planet cafe| |Restrooms:|Available| |Parking Fees:|Free| |Interpretation Services Offered:|Not Available| |Reservation Info. for Foreigners:|Group visit required| ## Detail Image ![/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018934_image2_1.webp](/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018934_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018938_image2_1.webp](/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018938_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018942_image2_1.webp](/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018942_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018950_image2_1.webp](/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018950_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018955_image2_1.webp](/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018955_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018957_image2_1.webp](/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018957_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018960_image2_1.webp](/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018960_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018967_image2_1.webp](/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018967_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018975_image2_1.webp](/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018975_image2_1.webp) ![/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018978_image2_1.webp](/2022-07-28-1659034133562/2018978_image2_1.webp) ## Contact - [☎️+82-54-823-8850](tel:+82548238850) ```googleMap latitude: 36.5659582060 longitude: 128.7792044224 title: 346-95 Gwangwangdanji-ro, Andong-si, Gyeongsangbuk-do ```

data.title: Andong Ontrepieum (안동 온뜨레피움)
data.description:
Ontrepieum, meaning "to bloom flowers in a garden," is situated in Andong's Cultural Tourism Complex. With an area of approximately 30,000 ㎡, it consists of a 1,500 ㎡ tropical green house, a 6,600 ㎡ herb garden, farming land, an animal performance theater, a nature experience section, and other areas. The tropical greenhouse features tropical and subtropical plants, including herbs, coffee and palm trees. Over 17,000 trees planted in the park, along with its water fountain and photo zones, make it the perfect place for a fun weekend getaway, not to mention that it has been used as a filming location. It is a fantastic place to take some photos with a unique feel.
The Andong Cultural Tourism Complex also has a couple of attractions nearby, including a KBS studio, the Korea Folk Museum, the Water Museum and Arts and Crafts Museum.
data.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Sajabawi Rock (사자바위)
dataList.description: The western coast of Ulleungdo Island is perfect for taking in the sunset; Sajabawi Rock in Namyang-ri is easily one of the most accessible places, located right next to the coastal road. The scenery is complete with squid drying in the the last rays of the sun at the coastal village, and boats heading heading out to catch more squid when the sun finally sets.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Rock-carved Standing Buddha in Icheon-dong, Andong (안동 이천동 마애여래입상)
dataList.description: Maaekseobulsang (Rock-carved Standing Buddha) in Icheon-dong, Andong is also referred to as Jebiwon Statue due to the small temple of the same name nearby. This statue is unique as the head and the body are not carved from the same rock. The head was carved from a different rock then placed over a large rock relief of the Buddhas body. This type of technique is frequently found in those built during the Goryeo dynasty. The distinct features and carving methods that can be observed from this particular statue are speculated to be from the 11th century. Although there is a small amount of damage on the back of the head, the statue is well-preserved overall.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Pohang Canal (포항운하)
dataList.description: Pohang Canal, completed in January 2014, cuts between Pohangs Songdo-dong and Jungdo 1-dong, connecting the waters under Dongbindaegyo Bridge with Hyeongsangang River to the south. The canal has a total length of 1.3km, adding on to the 8~10 km long seafaring road of Pohang. The canal is a restoration of an old water path, and the citizens have welcomed the eco-friendly construction as a community park. Many people enjoy walking along the canal or the romantic experience of riding on a cruise ship through the canal.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Pocheongyegok Valley (포천계곡)
dataList.description: Pocheongyegok Valley is a representative valley of Gayasan Mountain with clear water and a lush forest. The valley used to be a learning place for local scholars in the old days. Eungwa Lee Wonjo, a civil minister and a great scholar during the late Joseon period, spent the later years of his life at Mangwijeong Pavilion located along the upper steam near a small waterfall. The beautiful valley scenery stretches over 7 kilometers.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Palgongsan Provincial Park (Gatbawi Section) (팔공산도립공원(갓바위지구))
dataList.description: Located north of Gyeongsan, Palgongsan Mountain (altitude 1,192.3 meters) was called both Jungaksan and Buaksan Mountain during the Silla period. The mountain has many ancient temples and historical sites such as the Gatbawi Stone Buddha, Wonhyosa Temple, Cheonseongsa Temple and Bulgulsa Temple.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Nari Basin (나리분지)
dataList.description: Originally a caldera formed on the northern Seonginbong Peak, Nari Basin is the only flatland on Ulleungdo Island. The lava flow from the volcanic eruption created two other craters, which were turned into Nari Village in the northeast and Albong Village, now uninhabited, in the northwest. Records were found that the island was inhabited since the Usan-guk period, but the islanders had to move out of the island in the earlier Joseon period until a new settlement policy was enforced later on.
dataList.author: korea-tour

dataList.title: Najeong Beach (나정고운모래해변)
dataList.description: Najeong Beach is situated on the shores of the East Sea. The beach offers many facilities as well as a seawater hot spring. The parking lot and pine tree forest by the hot spring are open to the public. Various water sports are also available in the area.
dataList.author: korea-tour
